detaileddescription.para: Timeout for SNTP server time sync
APP_SYNC_TIME_INTERVAL_MAX_MS is the synchronization time with SNTP server.
Handle to store the main Command processor handle to be reused by ServalPAL thread
OS thread handle for Application controller to be used by run-time blocking threads

memberdef.name: Lwm2mSetup
memberdef.initializer: = { .CmdProcessorHandle = NULL, .IsSecure = APP_LWM2M_SECURITY_ENABLE, .SecurityMode = LWM2M_SECURITY_MODE_PRE_SHARED_KEY, .SecurityPreSharedKey = { .Identity = APP_LWM2M_DTLS_PSK_IDENTITY, .Key = APP_LWM2M_DTLS_PSK_KEY, .KeyLength = APP_LWM2M_DTLS_PSK_KEY_LENGTH, }, .EndPointName = APP_LWM2M_END_POINT_NAME, .Binding = "U", .Lifetime = APP_LWM2M_LIFETIME_IN_SECONDS, .ConfirmableNotification = false, .MACAddr = NULL, .TestMode = LWM2M_TEST_MODE_YES, .ServerURL = APP_LWM2M_SERVER_URL, .ServerPort = APP_LWM2M_SERVER_PORT, .ClientPort = APP_LWM2M_CLIENT_PORT, .StatusNotificationCB = AppLWM2MStatusNotificationCB, }

memberdef.name: WLANSetupInfo
memberdef.initializer: = { .IsEnterprise = false, .IsHostPgmEnabled = false, .SSID = WLAN_SSID, .Username = WLAN_PSK, .Password = WLAN_PSK, .IsStatic = WLAN_STATIC_IP, .IpAddr = WLAN_IP_ADDR, .GwAddr = WLAN_GW_ADDR, .DnsAddr = WLAN_DNS_ADDR, .Mask = WLAN_MASK, }

briefdescription.para: Gives control to the Application controller.

detaileddescription.para: This is a template function where the user can write his custom application.

briefdescription.para: To enable the necessary modules for the application.
Responsible for controlling the LWM2M Example client control flow.

parameterdescription.para: FreeRTOS task handle. Could be used if more than one thread is using this function block.

briefdescription.para: To setup the necessary modules for the application.
This will synchronizing the SNTP server time with the node.
